DOC.brief_summary: Autonomic dysreflexia high spinal cord-injured initiate full bladder bowel , try empty either . This randomise study aim evaluate whether irrigation procedure digital stimulation evacuation rectum less provocative autonomic dysreflexia . Participants bowel empty different day , morning fasting . Bladder fill sterile saline water evaluate third day control .
